item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Handler:

How do you run it from local host?


Run the source batch file, set the client ip to local host up which is “127.0.0.1” or “0.0.0.0”
And then compile and run. :3

Read full topic
